sources.title: 1970 - The Savage Wild - This is where the trails end and adventure begins!
sources.description:
A wildlife cameraman raises three wolves in the Yukon. Trappers who hear of the wolves try to kill them for the hides.

Director: Gordon Eastman
Writers: Earl E. Smith, Gordon Eastman
Stars: Gordon Eastman, Carl Spore, Maria Eastman

Genres: Adventure, Drama

metadata.Plot: This is the only film today that shows the Arctic wolf in his natural habitat. You will spend two years in Canada's north country with Gordon Eastman as he raises a family of Arctic wolves from pups to adults, filming them in their true wild environment as they learn to hunt and survive on their own. Learn the lifestyles of beautiful dall sheep, caribou, grizzly bear, along with all the other wildlife that the wolf is dependent on for his survival. A try adventure.
metadata.Actors: Gordon Eastman, Carl Spore, Maria Eastman
